ddl:
CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.chicago_crime.crime`
(
  unique_key INT64 NOT NULL,
  case_number STRING,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  block STRING,
  iucr STRING,
  primary_type STRING,
  description STRING,
  location_description STRING,
  arrest BOOL,
  domestic BOOL,
  beat INT64,
  district INT64,
  ward INT64,
  community_area INT64,
  fbi_code STRING,
  x_coordinate FLOAT64,
  y_coordinate FLOAT64,
  year INT64,
  updated_on TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT64,
  longitude FLOAT64,
  location STRING
)
OPTIONS(
  description="Chicago Crime dataset"
);
